issue.title: [Rust] Builder<T>::slice_mut assertions are too strict
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2441](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2441). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The assertions only allow slice up to builder length, rather than up to builder capacity.
